label: 留守所
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: from mid-Heian times onward, a governor’s absentee headquarters in his province of appointment when he himself is resident in the capital. Such a headquarters was staffed by resident provincial officials (zaichôkanjin  在庁官人).
